1:
Yahweh, how many are my enemies!\q Many have risen against me.
\q
2:
Many say about me,\q "There is no help for him from God."
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
3:
But you, Yahweh, are a shield around me,\q my glory, and the one who lifts up my head.
\q
4:
I lift up my voice to Yahweh,\q and he answers me from his holy hill.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
5:
I lay down and slept;\q I awoke, for Yahweh protected me.
\q
6:
I will not be afraid of the multitudes of people\q who have set themselves against me on every side.


\q
8:
Salvation comes from Yahweh.\q May your blessings be on your people.
\qs Selah\qs*
